entry.title: 查找数组中的指定元素
entry.content: 在已经排好序的数组中查找指定的数字12345678910111213141516171819int findBin(int a[],int n ,int key){ int low = 0; int high = n - 1; int mid ; while (low <= high) { mid = (low + high) / 2; if (key == a[mid]) { return mid; } if (key < a[mid]) high = mid; if (key > a[mid]) low = mid; } return -1;}

entry.title: 数组排序or对数组插入指定数据
entry.content: 单个数字按大小插入到已排好序的数组里和插入排序法的关系 单个数字按大小插入到已排好序的数组12345678910111213141516171819#include <stdio.h>void insertArray(int a[],int N,int num) //N是数组下标,num是要插入的数字{ int n = N + 1; int i; for (i = n - 1; i >= 0; i--) { if (num < a[i]) { a[i + 1] = a[i]; } else { a[i + 1] = num; a[i] = num; break; } }} 插入排序法123456void sequnceArray(int a[],int n) //n是数组的下标{ int i; for (i = 1; i < n; i++) insertArray(a, i, a[i]);}
